message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product, and I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm offering it to you for $150. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a lower price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest! I understand $150 was a bit high.  I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down to $135, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $100?
